Speaker: ﻿Man with Hat
Text: She told us everything. Don't worry, I kept my word. She didn't suffer long. Here, you earned it.
[He throws a cassette player to the boy.]

Speaker: Man with Hat
Text: How's it feel to play the traitor? No more war games - you are a real man, now, soldier.
[We see the name of the boy.]

Speaker: Man with Hat
Text: Give my regards to your Boss, when you get home.

[Not paying much attention to the man, Chico inserts his headphones to the player and turns on the music. The song "Here's to You" by Ennio Morricone is playing. The man with his soldiers gets into the car and leaves. While they ride we hear someone's voices in the background.]

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: Ten days ago, we got reports that Paz was still alive.

Speaker: Snake
Text: She survived?

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: She was rescued by a Belizean fisherman who found her drifting in the Caribbean.

Speaker: Snake
Text: So what's the plan? Silence her before we're compromised?

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: No. I've got something else in mind. Our "friends" at Cipher suspect Paz could be a double agent. She's being held for interrogation at the camp on the southern tip of Cuba.

Speaker: Snake
Text: Black site - nice. A slice of American Pie communist soil. And out of U.S. legal jurisdiction.

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: The upcoming inspection of Mother Base has to be connected somehow. The timing's to perfect.

Speaker: Snake
Text: The UN's nuclear inspection...

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: My guess is they're trying to corroborate Paz's leak.

Speaker: Snake
Text: We're an army without a nation.

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: World of our capabilities gets out, and we'll have the whole world out to shut us down. Having an American private intelligence agency involved's bad news. Cipher's the ones who sent Paz to us in the first place.

Speaker: Snake
Text: She knows their true nature.

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: But... Paz is our only link to Cipher. If she's still alive... We need her on our side.
[The man, meanwhile, drove up to the helipad. He approaches the helicopter and using a device to remove his marking.]

Speaker: Man with Hat
Text: The Trojan Horse's in.
[We see the name of the man and his disfigured face.]

Speaker: Skull Face
Text: This pirate crackdown's a go. Move!
[He, along with his soldiers, gets into the helicopter and flies away. As he flies we hear the voices again.]

Speaker: Snake
Text: So who's the other target?

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: That would be Chico. He's being held in the same area as Paz. Last radio contact was forty hours ago. Find them both. Bring 'em back alive. Enter the compound from the south cliff. Security Chico and Paz, then report back from the rendezvous point.
[The soldier throws out several emblems of "XOF" from the helicopter. The camera makes a short flight and shows us the protagonist of the game.]

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: We'll send a chopper from across the Cuban border. You should be back at Mother Base in time for lunch. You'll probably just miss our "guests". The only catch is: you go in solo. The politically sensitive nature of the mission means backup is not an option.

Speaker: Snake
Text: Fine. I like some alone time now and then. I'm in front of the prison camp.

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: Excellent, Snake. Age hasn't slow you down one bit.
[The protagonist slowly stands up, shining in the camera flashing from his night vision device. We see his name.]

Speaker: Snake
Text: Kept you waiting, huh?
[Snake takes out the iDroid. As you move to enemy territory, Miller will give advice on the game.]

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: Chico and Paz are being held in an old unused part of the compound. Get inside and head northeast. This is an infiltration mission. You've got to stay out of sight. Before you go any further, use your binoculars to recon the area. What do you see? Press the CALL button to get more intel. Keep low. You can check the controls on the pause screen. If you're ready your weapon while crawling you can move horizontally left or right. If you do that holding the Dash Button you move faster. To climb an obstacle press the Action Button. Now head east to the old person area. Bring up the targets' location on your iDroid. Take a good look at the enemy through you binoculars and you can them. Marked enemies can be sensed when nearby, even there's a wall between you and them. But it only works if you stop and take the time to focus your attention. This helps you maintain situational awareness. Try it. You should move the bodies of enemies somewhere out of sight. Contact me if you need advice.
[Snake finds an old prison.]

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: That's the old prison area. The targets are there.

Speaker: Prisoner 1
Text: Get me out of this place...

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: There is someone in there... What do you plan on doing?

Speaker: Prisoner 2
Text: Help, I need help... help.

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: A POW? ... That's fine if he has some intel, I guess...

Speaker: Prisoner 3
Text: Lemme go home... Lemme go home... Let me go back to my country...

Speaker: Snake
Text: Chico. Chico! Chico, it's me!

Speaker: Chico
Text: No... No! Go away!

Speaker: Prisoner 3
Text: Hey!

Speaker: Chico
Text: Go away!

Speaker: Prisoner 3
Text: Come on man! Let me out of here, please!

Speaker: Chico
Text: Get off me!

Speaker: Snake
Text: Chico, keep it down!

Speaker: Chico
Text: Go away!!
[Seeing that someone is being rescued, other prisoners are also revitalized.]

Speaker: Prisoner 3
Text: Come on, right over here!

Speaker: Prisoner 2
Text: Hey, hey!

Speaker: Prisoner 1
Text: Over here! Let me out!

Speaker: Prisoner 2
Text: You let me out, too!

Speaker: Chico
Text: Get off me! Get off!
[Snake starts to choking Chico.]

Speaker: Snake
Text: Chico, calm down... Calm down... Don't fight it.

Speaker: Snake
Text: I've got Chico.

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: And Paz?

Speaker: Snake
Text: Not here.

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: Are you sure?

Speaker: Snake
Text: Pretty sure.

Speaker: Snake
Text: Is Chico able to walk?
[Snake examines the unconscious Chico and sees the bolts screwed into his feet.]

Speaker: Snake
Text: Hold on. Not gonna happen.

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: You'll have to carry him out, then. Okay, Boss, change of plans. Haul Chico over to the rendezvous point. We'll get Paz's whereabouts out of him once he's calmed down.
[Snake puts Chico on his shoulders.]

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: I've marked the RV on your map. OK, now carry Chico there.
[Snake getting closer to the point of evacuation.]

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: The RV's just a little further.

Speaker: Chico
Text: Paz is dead.

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: Great, you've reached the RV. Put the target down for a minute. How's he doing?

Speaker: Snake
Text: Chico, where's Paz?
[Chico gives his headphones to the Snake without words. Wearing them, he hears the sounds of beating and pain.]

Speaker: Chico
Text: She's dead.

Speaker: Snake
Text: When was this recorded?

Speaker: Chico
Text: She's dead.
[Chico gives the Snake a cassette with the record.]

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: Okay now use your iDroid to call the chopper for pickup. Roger that chopper request. It's headed your way now.
[When the helicopter arrives, Snake loads Chico into it.]

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: Chico's tape... Think it could give us a clue to Paz's location? Use your iDroid to listen to it.
[Snake plays the cassette on his player.]

Speaker: Chico
Text: Paz!

Speaker: Soldier
Text: On your feet!

Speaker: Chico
Text: OK…

[Then follow some background sounds. While Snake is listening to the tape, Miller is communicating with him on the codec. Together they are trying to understand what is recorded on the cassette. During communication Snake sneaks through the base and climbs into one of the trucks.]

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: Chico was... taken out of his cage. Did he leave the recording while he was being moved...? Paz might be up ahead... I hear vehicles... and a flag... Must be near the heliport. A gate... Chico leave the tape on record while he was being moved. Try using that you hear to find Paz. If you are still not sure, listen to the tape again. A surveillance camera...
[On the truck, Snake gets to the fenced part of the base.]

Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: That's the admin building. Watch your corners. CQC is effective for dealing with nearby enemies.
[Snake makes his way deep into the base, simultaneously collecting Chico's tapes. Listening to them, he decides where to go next. After a while he stumbles on two guards.]

Speaker: Guard #1
Text: Hey, we get confirmation on that garbage disposal yet?

Speaker: Guard #2
Text: Yeah, they just took care of it.

Speaker: Guard #1
Text: All right, I'm heading back up top. Stay here and keep watch.

Speaker: Guard #2
Text: You got it.
[Snake finds a cage in which sits a shaved, beaten girl, tied to the wall.]

Speaker: Snake
Text: Paz...
[We see the girl's name.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [The girl is hardly alive. Snake cuts the ropes and puts the girl on the floor.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: Boss. Get Paz onto the helicopter.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [Snake takes the girl to the surface.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Paz
Text: Hit me... Hit me all you want...

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [At the gate he meets two guards.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Guard #1
Text: I'm soaked to the bone...

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Guard #2
Text: Forecast says we go this until morning.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Guard #1
Text: Looks like they're right - for once.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Guard #2
Text: Can you believe that crew taking choppers out in this storm?

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Guard #1
Text: It's pitch-black too. I knew they were crazy.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Guard #2
Text: Either that, or they got some stone-cold rotorheads at the controls. And they flew a tight formation - I guess they got a lot of trust.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Guard #1
Text: Trust, my ass. You'd have to drag me into one of those.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Guard #2
Text: Yeah, no shit.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [Looks like the guards find out that the girl is lost.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Radio
Text: CP, this is Zulu 2! The girl's gone. Appears she escaped. Over!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: CP
Text: This is CP - understood! Commenced a search, ASAP. Do not let her get away. Out!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: They've discovered Paz is missing. They'll be looking for her. Hurry. You've got to get outta there.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [Snake with the girl get to the place of evacuation.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Paz
Text: My stomach…

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: CP
Text: All fireteams, this is CP! Focus all your fire on that enemy chopper!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Helicopter pilot
Text: Making forced lending! Stand by.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: Put the target on the chopper.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Paz
Text: Don't... No...

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [Snake puts the Paz in the helicopter and he climbs inside. They fly away. In the helicopter Chico examines Paz lying on a stretcher and notices on her stomach an oblique incision, hastily sewn with threads.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Chico
Text: Snake... Snake!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Snake
Text: Medic! She's rigged, damn it. We were set up!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Medic
Text: We gotta get it out. No time for anesthetic. We have to open her now.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Snake
Text: Hold her down. Hold her down!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [Medic cuts the thread and opens the incision. Inside we see a bomb.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Medic
Text: Keep her gut in!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [After a few minutes of screaming and pain, the bomb is taken out. Snake throws it out of the helicopter.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Chico
Text: Boss...

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Medic
Text: Breathing's stable... No active bleeding. She's clean. I'm closing her up. Hold her steady. It's gotta be a continuous suture.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Radio
Text: Control tower, this is Morpho One. All hummingbirds are on the wing. We'll shake hands, then head back to the cage. Boss, you got a call. Boss, can you hear me?

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Snake
Text: What's up, Huey?

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Huey
Text: Our "guests" are right in time. Document destruction and hungar decontamination are complete. AFVs has been stowed away, and ZEKE's on the seafloor along with the nuke. Everyone's got their story straight. The guided tour'll be wrapped up by the time you get home.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Snake
Text: Make me proud.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Huey
Text: By the time they leave, I'll have the IAEA praising us as the poster boys for world peace. Out.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [Some time passes. The helicopter flies to the base.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Huey
Text: Tower, this is Morpho One. Do you copy? Can get through! The link seems fine, but...

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [Snake opens the hatch and sees the burning boats and subsequently the base itself. He takes a rifle.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Medic
Text: Look! Commander Miller!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [Snake notices that the soldiers on the base is still fighting. He jumps off and opens fire.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Soldier
Text: Enemy chopper!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Soldier
Text: Incoming! Incoming!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [The heroes shoot back and together retreat to the helicopter.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: Move!!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [Seeing the dying soldiers and losing his mind, Snake rushes into the attack.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: Snake!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [When Snake comes to his senses, he hears the voice of reason and sits down in the helicopter.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Snake
Text: Go!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [The heroes fly away. In a helicopter we are introduced to another character.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: The inspection was nothing but a smokescreen. I heard explosions, then... They played us like a damn fiddle!  Give it back! This isn't right! That was ours... We built it, damn it!  You spying bitch...! C'mon, start talking, bitch! C'mon, get up and start talking!!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [Suddenly she gets up and starts to rush about the helicopter. Miller runs up to her.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: You little... [a medic grabs him to stop him]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Paz
Text: Bomb...

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Snake
Text: It's alright. We got it out.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [Paz approaches the hatch and opens it.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Paz
Text: There is another... in my...

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [She jumps out of the helicopter.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Snake
Text: Nooooooo!!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [She explodes in the air. A huge explosion destroys the helicopter and breaks the one what flying alongside. They collide. One of the fragments pierce Snake’s forehead. Next, we see a text explaining further events.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [Next we see titles, behind which the voice of Skull Face is heard.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Skull Face
Text: Your favorite song. Nicola. Bart. Immigrants, wrongly executed. But their deaths as a message to others. That ours is a society that murders the innocent. Do you, too, believe you sacrifice will change the world?

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [After the credits, we hear an additional dialogue on the background of the title of the game.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Skull Face
Text: Cipher has been in hiding ever since his grand experiment. No one's seen him in years. All we hear are orders delivery by proxy. Except you. You met with him - face to face - in order to contact Big Boss. Tell me where he is. Where is Cipher... Where is Zero? I've never known choice. Where I was born, the language I speak... I've never had the freedom to choose for myself. But you, right now, are free. Do as you will.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Paz
Text: This will save Big Boss?

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Skull Face
Text: It may.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Paz
Text: Will you really kill Zero for me?

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Skull Face
Text: Not for you.

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Paz
Text: Alright... Zero is...

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [The recording truncated. After that, we see a short cutscene, telling us about the events after the explosion. Snake and Miller, both barely alive, lie on hospital beds. Around them fuss doctors.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Kazuhira Miller
Text: Don't you die on me, damn it!

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Text: [While doctors are fighting for his life, the recent events on the base sweep past Snake’s eyes.]

Time/Location: A double agent whose true alliances are unknown
Speaker: Doctor
Text: B.P.'s dropping! Intubate! Now! Clear! No response, hit him again! Clear!
